text: 07 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-MSD Animal Health Gets Positive Opinion From European Medicines Agency For Bravecto Plus Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - Merck & Co Inc: * MSD ANIMAL HEALTH RECEIVES POSITIVE OPINION FROM EUROPEAN MEDICINES AGENCY FOR BRAVECTOÂ® PLUS (FLURALANER PLUS MOXIDECTIN) SPOT-ON SOLUTION FOR CATS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
